name: Flutter of Birds: Tori-tachi no Habataki
summary: Matsui Yuusaku, a medical college student, receives a letter from his uncle, once a famous doctor in Tokyo who now manages a hospital in a small village, with an invitation to visit him and assist with the hospital work diring summer vacation. Yuusaku hopes that this work will help him to understand why he has chosen to be a doctor, so he decides to accept this offer.
